exerciseUpdateForm.warning:
**Functional Purpose**: Informative warning about potential solution failure
**UI Location**: Exercise Update Modal (below tabs, above action buttons)
**When Users See This**: When viewing the exercise update modal
**Technical Context**: Standard text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "By updating to the latest version, your solution may fail the tests and need to be updated."
exerciseUpdateForm.updateExercise:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to confirm updating an exercise
**UI Location**: Exercise Update Modal (primary action button)
**When Users See This**: When a user decides to proceed with the exercise update
**Technical Context**: Standard button text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Update exercise"
exerciseUpdateForm.dismiss:
**Functional Purpose**: Button text to dismiss the exercise update modal
**UI Location**: Exercise Update Modal (secondary action button)
**When Users See This**: When a user decides not to update the exercise and closes the modal
**Technical Context**: Standard button text; no special formatting
**Current English**: "Dismiss"
